task.summary: feat(chat): update ChatMessageRepository to use conversationId for message retrieval and marking as read
feat(email-verification): implement resend verification email feature and enhance user registration flow

feat(chat): fix conversation creation, CSRF, and UTF-8 issues; add setup scripts and enhance chat integration
- Fix CSRF protection for chat conversation creation and message APIs in customer/seller chat pages - Add CSRF meta tags and ensure all POST requests include CSRF token - Update ChatController to support product info in chat and improve error handling/logging - Ensure chat tables use utf8mb4 encoding for full Vietnamese character support (SQL scripts and config) - Add scripts for database setup, UTF-8 fixes, and chat table creation for online DB - Enhance application properties for correct locale and MySQL UTF-8 settings - Add .env.example for environment variable guidance - Improve ChatService to load messages and unread counts per conversation - Update Conversation entity with JSON property annotations for API consistency - Show chat unread badge in product detail and auto-update via API - Add documentation and test guides for chat fixes and separation
feat(chat): add customer chat page with real-time messaging, conversation management, and enhanced UI/UX

feat(chat): refactor chat message handling, WebSocket endpoints, and conversation logic
- Update ChatController to use new WebSocket message mappings and improve message broadcasting logic - Refactor ChatMessage entity: add roomId, fileUrl, readAt fields; rename type to messageType; update is_read handling - Enhance MessageRepository with new queries for unread messages and conversation message retrieval - Simplify and optimize ChatService: auto-create conversations, improve message saving, and sort conversations by last message time - Update WebSocketConfig to use /ws-chat endpoint and adjust broker configuration - Revamp chat.html JavaScript: update WebSocket connection logic, message sending, optimistic UI, and conversation subscriptions - Minor SQL and repository adjustments for consistency and safety

feat(chat): refactor chat message handling, WebSocket endpoints, and conversation logic
- Update ChatController to use new WebSocket message mappings and improve message broadcasting logic - Refactor ChatMessage entity: add roomId, fileUrl, readAt fields; rename type to messageType; update is_read handling - Enhance MessageRepository with new queries for unread messages and conversation message retrieval - Simplify and optimize ChatService: auto-create conversations, improve message saving, and sort conversations by last message time - Update WebSocketConfig to use /ws-chat endpoint and adjust broker configuration - Revamp chat.html JavaScript: update WebSocket connection logic, message sending, optimistic UI, and conversation subscriptions - Minor SQL and repository adjustments for consistency and safety

feat(chat): improve chat layout, scrolling, and auto-scroll to latest message
- Refactor chat page CSS for better layout and independent scrolling of sidebar and message area - Ensure chat input remains fixed at the bottom - Add MutationObserver to auto-scroll to newest message when messages update - Enhance scrollbar appearance for improved UX

feat(chat): enhance chat UI layout, scrolling, and message rendering
- Refactor chat page CSS for improved layout, responsive design, and independent scrolling of sidebar and message area - Ensure chat input remains fixed at the bottom for better usability - Add MutationObserver and JS logic to auto-scroll to the latest message when new messages arrive - Refine message rendering for smoother experience and consistent avatar/status display - Improve scrollbar appearance and overall chat UX
chore: update workspace configuration for enhanced chat UI improvements
chore: update workspace configuration for enhanced chat UI improvements
feat(chat): implement file upload feature with image and document support
